conclusion: Consider forces on block P and board ab to find frictional force by ground.
Block P is on board ab, which is on the ground.
Identify forces on block P: gravitational force, normal force, and kinetic frictional force.
Normal force on block P is N_P = mg.
Kinetic frictional force on block P is f_k = μ2 mg.
Identify forces on board ab: gravitational force, normal force by ground, kinetic friction by block P, and friction by ground.
Normal force by ground is N_ground = (M + m)g.
Frictional force by block P on board ab is μ2 mg to the left.
Frictional force by ground on board ab must balance force by block P.
Frictional force by ground on board ab is f_ground = μ2 mg.
